item.name: IP Filter 1
item.comment: Select to enable it. e.g. 192.168.0.100-255.255.255.255, 192.168.0.100 means IP£¬255.255.255.255 means Mask, more information please read the manual to get more information.

item.name: IP Filter 2
item.comment: Select to enable it. e.g. 192.168.0.100-255.255.255.255, 192.168.0.100 means IP£¬255.255.255.255 means Mask, more information please read the manual to get more information.

item.name: Set the other COMs same with this.
item.comment: Set the other COMs same with this, except Work Port.

item.name: Timeout to Disconnect(10ms)
item.comment: 10ms per uint,from 0 to 60000

item.name: TCP Alive Check Time(s)
item.comment: from 0 to 60000s

item.name: The First Byte of a Frame(HEX)
item.comment: Select to enable it.

item.name: The Last Byte of a Frame(HEX)
item.comment: Select to enable it.

option.name: 2(When Data Bits is 5,it means 1.5 Stop Bits)

item.name: Frame Length
item.comment: Max 1478 Bytes

item.name: Frame Interval(ms)
item.comment: Max 5000ms

item.name: TCP Turbo
item.comment: The transfer speed can be improved by enabling this option.

item.name: TCP Connection Password
item.comment: Check password when connection.

item.name: TCP Connection Info
item.comment: Send Info when TCP Connection.

item.name: TCP Connection Condition
item.comment: Only use in TCP CLIENT.

option.name: When receive any data from COM

item.name: TCP Connection Count
item.comment: From 0 to 4

item.name: Target IP 1
item.comment: Target IP can be IP Address, e.g. 192.168.0.1; or IP Address Section(Only Use in UDP), e.g. 192.168.0.1-192.168.0.7; or Domain, e.g. www.embedcontrol.com.

item.name: Target IP 2
item.comment: Target IP can be IP Address, e.g. 192.168.0.1; or IP Address Section(Only Use in UDP), e.g. 192.168.0.1-192.168.0.7; or Domain, e.g. www.embedcontrol.com.

item.name: Target IP 3
item.comment: Target IP can be IP Address, e.g. 192.168.0.1; or IP Address Section(Only Use in UDP), e.g. 192.168.0.1-192.168.0.7; or Domain, e.g. www.embedcontrol.com.

item.name: Target IP 4
item.comment: Target IP can be IP Address, e.g. 192.168.0.1; or IP Address Section(Only Use in UDP), e.g. 192.168.0.1-192.168.0.7; or Domain, e.g. www.embedcontrol.com.
